text: ai logo! yadi tumhen dobaara jee uthane ke vishay mein koee sandeh ho to dekho, hamane tumhen mittee se paida kiya, phir veery se, phir lothade se, phir maans kee botee se jo banaavat mein poorn dasha mein bhee hotee hai aur apoorn dasha mein bhee, taaki ham tumapar spasht kar den aur ham jise chaahate hai ek niyat samay tak garbhaashayon mein thaharae rakhate hai. phir tumhen ek bachche ke roop mein nikaal laate hai. phir (tumhaara paalan-poshan hota hai) taaki tum apanee yuvaavastha ko praapt ho aur tumamen se koee to pahale mar jaata hai aur koee budhaape kee jeern avastha kee or pher diya jaata hai jisake parinaamasvaroop, jaanane ke pashchaat vah kuchh bhee nahin jaanata. aur tum bhoomi ko dekhate ho ki sookhee padee hai. phir jahaan hamane usapar paanee barasaaya ki vah phabak uthee aur vah ubhar aaee aur usane har prakaar kee shobhaayamaan cheeze ugaee
